Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 1 Hetugocchaka » 1.6 Nahetusahetukaduka » 1.6.7 Pañhāvāra » 1.6.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 1.6.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Sampayutta
Hetugocchaka
Nahetusahetukaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Sampayutta
191.
517Nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo—  nahetu sahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
518Nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo—  nahetu ahetuko eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (2)
<< Jhānādiup Vippayutta >>
